title: Divided Brain, Divided World, Iain McGilchrist
description:
How is the crisis of culture based in a fundamental division of perception, based in the physiology of our brains?

Iain McGilchrist is becoming of the most influential thinkers, linking together the worlds of science, psychology and spirituality.

This is a a short film with pictures from a film based on his work 'The Divided brain' and words from his interview with Rebel Wisdom, 'Certainty and Flow'.

Watch The Divided Brain here: https://thedividedbrain.com/about/

Certainty and Flow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fI1ngqwH5us
